page.title: 08PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: { TIGGY ON LINES My favourite playground game is Tiggy on Lines.It is played with a group of children.You have two catchers standing beside a wall.They count to ten and then they run after everybody else.You can only run along the lines on the playground.If they touch you,you are caught.When you are caught you have to put your hand up on the wall where the catchers counted to ten.There are only two ways you can get off the wall. If sombody goes under your arm but that isn't likely. The most likely thing to happen is that the person guarding will step over one particular line that is out of his bounds that means all people on the wall are off.That means the game starts again. Alan Young
